title: 3 and Out - Fans Drive TV Deal; Pats FA Spending Spree; Wentz Rebuild Timetable; McVay/Shanahan Rivalry; Headlines; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Fans Drive TV Deal; Pats FA Spending Spree; Wentz Rebuild Timetable; McVay/Shanahan Rivalry; Headlines; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John explains why the NFL fans are driving the insane money behind the league's new TV deal, what's behind the Patriots atypical free agent spending spree, why the Colts unified coach/GM front will weather setbacks in the rebuilding of Carson Wentz, and why Sean McVay and Kyle Shanahan's rivalry will only intensify in the coming years. He also runs down the top stories form around the league and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!





5. NFL Stories

Mailbag

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
